citoid-520-error: Error message for when citoid service returns a 520 error
citoid-citation-widget-insert-button: Label for the button to insert a chosen reference.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-back:
Label for the button to go back to the lookup panel in the inspector.
{{Identical|Back}}
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-lookup-button:
Label for the lookup button for citation inputs.
{{Identical|Lookup}}
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-search-label: Label for the URL/DOI search field.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-search-placehold: Placeholder for the URL/DOI search field.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-search-progress: Message for when the search is in progress
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-title: The title displayed on the dialog
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-use-general-dial: Label for the user to click to use the full citation tool.
Label for the user to use the full citation tool. $1 - the button to open the citation dialog.
citoid-citeFromIDDialog-use-general-erro: Label notifying the user there was a problem creating their reference, and offering to use the full citation tool. $1 - the button to open the citation dialog.
citoid-citeFromIDTool-title:
Label for the button to add a citation in the toolbar
{{Identical|Cite}}
citoid-typeMap-config-error: Error message indicating Mediawiki:citoid-template-type-map.json either doesn't exist or contains errors.
citoid-unknown-error: Error message indicating that the service to create citations has returned an error or is temporarily malfunctioning, asking the user to try again later.
